arguments.name: background
arguments.description:
While the geolocation of the current user is public, clients should update it in the background every half-an-hour or so, while setting this flag.
Do this only if the new location is more than 1 KM away from the previous one, or if the previous location is unknown.

arguments.name: selfExpires
arguments.description: If set, the geolocation of the current user will be public for the specified number of seconds; pass 0x7fffffff to disable expiry, 0 to make the current geolocation private; if the flag isn't set, no changes will be applied.

throws.description: You must have a profile picture to publish your geolocation
throws.name: USERPIC_UPLOAD_REQUIRED
